explanation: [0-0] In a jungle, a man wearing glasses is squatting by a pile of wood, holding a saw in his right hand and a piece of wood in his left hand. There is a tent behind him, with green plants and rising gray smoke.

[0-10] Then the man saws the wood with the saw, and the gray smoke behind him slowly rises. Then the picture zooms in, he cuts the wood with an axe, then hammers it with the axe, nailing one piece of wood horizontally to the other. Then the camera zooms out, the man is hammering the wood, the camera cuts again, he is sawing the wood with a saw, the camera cuts to the front of him again, he is sawing the wood, then puts down the saw, picks up the nailed wooden frame and gets up.
